DOC.brief_summary: The study aimed to compare CT-based virtual autopsy with classic autopsy as a tool for quality control in intensive care medicine.
DOC.brief_title: Virtual Autopsy for Quality Control on Intensive Care Medicine
DOC.detailed_description: The study aimed to compare CT-based virtual autopsy with classic autopsy as a tool for quality control in intensive care medicine. Especially with respect to complications during intervention like catheter pacement.
DOC.criteria: age >18 all patients dying in the icu during the study period relatives refuse participation in the study
